analyzed: valāhaka kāyike vaḥ bhikkhave deve desessāmi
katame ca bhikkhave valāhaka kāyikāḥ devāḥ
ime vuccanti bhikkhave valāhaka kāyikāḥ devā ti

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bhante hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yena midhekaccaḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā valāhakakāyikānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati iti

original: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhu ekaccaḥ kāyena su caritam carati vācāya su caritam carati manasā su caritam carati
valāhaka kāyikāḥ devāḥ dīgha āyukāḥ vaṇṇavantaḥ sukha bahulāḥ

original: ‘aho vatāhaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjeyyan’ti.
analyzed: aho vata aham kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā valāhakakāyikānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjeyyanti

original: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: saḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā valāhakakāyikānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati

original: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā valāhakakāyikānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti.
analyzed: ayam kho bhikkhu hetu ayam paccayaḥ yena midhā ekaccaḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā valāhakakāyikānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati iti
sīta valāhaka dānūpa kāra sutta dasaka

original: Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho so bhikkhu bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho saḥ bhikkhu bhagavantam etat avoca

analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bhante hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yena midhekaccaḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sītavalāhakānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati iti

original: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhu ekaccaḥ kāyena su caritam carati vācāya su caritam carati manasā su caritam carati
sīta valāhakāḥ devāḥ dīgha āyukāḥ vaṇṇavantaḥ sukha bahulā ati

original: ‘aho vatāhaṁ kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjeyyan’ti.
analyzed: aho vata aham kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sīta valāhakānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjeyyanti

original: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sītavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: saḥ kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sītavalāhakānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati

vassa valāhakānam devānam sahabyatam upapajjati iti

original: “Idha, bhikkhu, ekacco kāyena sucaritaṁ carati, vācāya sucaritaṁ carati, manasā sucaritaṁ carati.
analyzed: idha bhikkhu ekaccaḥ kāyena su caritam carati vācāya su caritam carati manasā su caritam carati

original: Ayaṁ kho, bhikkhu, hetu, ayaṁ paccayo, yena midhekacco kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā vassavalāhakānaṁ devānaṁ sahabyataṁ upapajjatī”ti.

original: “ko nu kho, bhante, hetu, ko paccayo, yenekadā sītaṁ hotī”ti?
